tool_description: Aggregates and calculates statistical measures for customer ratings including averages, distributions, and trends over time.

structured_reviews_source.description: Source identifier for structured review data containing ratings

grouping_method.description: How to group ratings: by_competitor, by_platform, by_time_period, or overall

time_granularity.description: Time period granularity: daily, weekly, monthly, or quarterly

error_messages: Invalid data source: structured_reviews_source not found or contains no rating data.
Invalid grouping method: Use one of [by_competitor, by_platform, by_time_period, overall].
Invalid time granularity: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly].
Insufficient rating data: Not enough ratings available for meaningful statistical analysis.
usage: Provide structured_reviews_source with rating data. Configure grouping and time parameters as needed. Returns comprehensive rating statistics and distributions.

total_ratings_processed.description: Total number of ratings included in aggregation

overall_average_rating.description: Overall average rating across all data

rating_distribution.description: Count of ratings for each star level [1-star, 2-star, 3-star, 4-star, 5-star]

aggregation_summary.description: Summary of aggregation results and key statistical insights
